ComicInfo.Summary:
Due to Block Mania resistance Judge General Pukov orders the total extermination of the population, which earns him a transfer to Siberia. War Marshal Kazan orders release of the Block Mania antidote.
Breaking off his surprise assault on the Buzzard, Rogue chooses to save the escaping prisoners.
